ygData.subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC  Nobody ever called me nice so why start now? Ice sensed a sudden sharp pain coming from the other bot. She had to buy time for Lunarpine to back her up.

OOC  Nobody ever called me nice so why start now?

Ice sensed a sudden sharp pain coming from the other bot. She had to buy
time for Lunarpine to back her up. She fealt bad about the bot and wanted to
help but he'd already tried blowing them up once. "Keep talking," she called
out,"I'll be there soon as I can."

Lunarpine found a small opening on the other side but it was to small for
him to enter. He again transformed to his half wolf form and started to dig.
he could smell the bot inside, a sudden breeze through the cave gave him the
scent of mech fluid, a scent that wasn't there before. "If he's got a broken
leg then I'm a primates creators counit." (Monkeys uncle.) he dug a little
faster knowing that Ice wouldn't wait forever.
----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 3:47 PM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�

OOC:  Why can't you be a nice Person and just Blow up.

BIC:  Grizzltron took out a knife and stabbed his leg as he twisted it,
breaking it.  He than put the knife back but kept the grenade launcher
trained on the far wall in front of him.  "I'm back here, help me."
